modName: Red Assassin Armor HD by Den
summary: This mod add new armor to game
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#660000][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3751738-1396708318.jpg[/img][/color]
[/size][center][font=Georgia][i][color=#1e84cc]I recommend to look screeshots in full size
[youtube]wnpP3_Yi3r0[/youtube][/color]
[/i][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][i]Video by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/18957554]ThatYoutubeGamer[/url][/i][/size][/font][size=5] [/size]
[color=#660000]======[/color][b][font=Times New Roman][size=6][i]Description[/i][/size][/font][/b][size=5][color=#660000]======[/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=4][u]UPDATE 28.10.2016
[/u][/size]Added version that supports Argonians and Khajits[/color][/size]
[font=Georgia][i][size=3]This mod adds new armor. Included male and female versions. It called Red Assassin Armor. It's based on standard Nightingale armor and it's absolutely standalone. Every part of armor is charmed and it has strong characteristics. You can find it in chest ([color=#ff0000]Nightgates Inn[/color]), in room of Gourme (basement). You can find:[/size]
[size=3]Gloves (1H weapon 40)[/size]
[size=3]Cuirass (Health&Magic restoration) [/size]
[size=3]Boots (Sneaking)[/size]
[size=3]Circlet[/size]
[size=3]Amulet (Poison resistance)[/size]
[size=3]Hood [/size][/i][/font][/center][font=Georgia][i][size=3]

[/size][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3751738-1439344311.png[/img]
[/i]
[i]
[/i][/font][center][font=Georgia][i][color=#660000][size=5]======[i][color=#660000][size=5][b]History[/b][/size][/color][/i]======[/size][/color][/i]
[i]Two hundred years ago there was a nightingale named Haros, he was a Supreme Nightingale but in one moment he wanted more powers and he made blood ritual with his armor and his family jewelries... And Sitis heard him... Sitis improved his armor and it's became bloody but more powerful than earlier... But armor was cursed and it was lost for many years until one old man found it in empty cave near Windhelm.... After that he created Nightgates Inn tavern



[i][color=#660000][size=5]======[i][color=#660000][size=5][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color][/i]======
[/size][/color][/i]No any requirememts


[/i][i][i][i][color=#660000][size=5]======[i][color=#660000][size=5][b]Body compatible[/b][/size][/color][/i]======
[/size][/color][/i][/i][size=3]This armor use default body model. So it's COMPATIBLE with ANY body model.

[/size]

[color=#660000]======[/color][/i][i][b][color=#660000][size=5]Install&Uninstall[/size][/color][/b][/i][i][color=#660000]======[/color]
[/i][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Install: Put all files to Data directory and activate esp file
Uninstall: Deactivate esp file and delete RedAssasin folders from meshes&textures folders[/i][/size][/font][/center]
author: Den987
